channel.title: Vala on Aimer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vala on Aimer's Blog

item.title: Vala Env Setup
item.description: vala env setup When it’s talking to Linux development, there are many ways to go. But I love elementary and want to build some awesome apps with vala. So this article is about how to set up your vala develop environment on elementary os. In the future, there will more articles about vala and Linux development. System Info When I write this artice (2021-7-31), elementary os 6 is still in develop, so I install it in gnome boxes.
